title: The Curse of Monkey Island - Game soundtrack (recorded by wqcr)
description:
Hi,
this should be Game soundtrack from The Curse of Monkey Island composed by Michael Land. 
I recorded it on Audigy 2ZS from original files extracted from game by
Scumm Revisited. But these files have only 12kHz range, so I rerecorded it 
directly using CMSS2 to GoldWave. Then I remaster it, made some cue sheets and split this
125 minutes big file to 85 files. (Last 3 are lately added from Monkey Island 2 soundtrack)

Some "same size" songs are faded to previous (like Barbers, Blood Island) usually in half of "main" song. For example - in extracted songs there are 5 versions of Barber indoor. So I faded 2 song together and 3 songs together and put it to correct order. So there are 3 versions of Blood Island song (v1, lighthouse, separated).

All files converted to FLAC using 16bit Maximum pattern.
But if you want my master record in 24bit WAV, write me e-mail to <a class="__cf_email__" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" data-cfemail="235452405163545240510d404c4e">[email&#160;protected]</a><script cf-hash='f9e31' type="text/javascript">
/* <![CDATA[ */!function(){try{var t="currentScript"in document?document.currentScript:function(){for(var t=document.getElementsByTagName("script"),e=t.length;e--;)if(t[e].getAttribute("cf-hash"))return t[e]}();if(t&&t.previousSibling){var e,r,n,i,c=t.previousSibling,a=c.getAttribute("data-cfemail");if(a){for(e="",r=parseInt(a.substr(0,2),16),n=2;a.length-n;n+=2)i=parseInt(a.substr(n,2),16)^r,e+=String.fromCharCode(i);e=document.createTextNode(e),c.parentNode.replaceChild(e,c)}}}catch(u){}}();/* ]]> */</script>

CD1 contains base master cut, but there is a length limitation on CD, so not all songs is here
CD2 represents bonus CD, where most of missing songs are available

File names and titles in FLAC I made separately for each file (This was really hard work :-)

BUT STILL, THERE AREN'T ALL SONGS - so if you miss your favourite, write me e-mail and I will rerecord it for you.

PS: Seed please
